name: RotoWire
0:
”Alexa, what's the latest baseball news from RotoWire?”
”Alexa, ask Rotowire for the latest fantasy basketball news.”
”Alexa, read me recent NHL headlines from RotoWire.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roto wire
des:
From continuously providing the fastest real-time news, most in-depth analysis, and the largest scope of coverage in fantasy sports at RotoWire.com, we are now bringing the latest fantasy sports updates directly to you.

Using simple phrases like, "Alexa, what's the latest news from RotoWire?" or "Alexa, get me the latest fantasy baseball news from RotoWire", you can have Alexa read you the latest fantasy sport headlines from RotoWire.com to help you find and maintain that edge in your fantasy game.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
